attributes.action: Create a Bank Holiday of inclusive pride in being English on St George's day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A Day to celebrate our open and inclusive and very successful nation. To show others that we are proud of being part of it! We do not wish it to be a Britain day and as we are a freedom-loving nation there should be no compulsion to do anything except celebrate being English

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
